title: Room to learn
creator_credit: Joyce Chopra and Early Learning Centrer
brief_description: Shows an outstanding preschool facility - the Early Learning Center, Connecticut, whose design is based on the Montessori philosophy that the environment of early schooling affects a child’s learning processes over a lifetime.
